page.title: 03THE JEWISH SABBATH
page.content:
The Jewish Sabbath
Part of the north Manchester Jewish Community lives in the area of Higher Broughton. There is one Jewish Primary school in the area and it is the pupils of this schol " Cassel Fox " who have written the following passage.
Sabbath starts on Friday when night falls. Father and the male children go to the synagogue for afternoon and evening prayers. The prayers contain songs to welcome in the Sabbath, or shabbos as pronounced by Jewish people. When the prayer is finished all the males walk home in a happy mood.
